biography: Olli is a highly respected competitor known for his calm demeanor and meticulous approach to the game. Representing Hirsala Golf, Olli is a dedicated student of the sport, often seen analyzing swing mechanics and course management strategies, much like his idol, Bryson Dechambeau.

A familiar face at the Hector Trophée, Olli is set to make his ninth appearance in 2025. His past performances include one victory in the Hector Trophée and one individual Victor Trophy, marking him as a formidable player in both team and individual formats. His deep understanding of the game, combined with his strategic thinking, makes him a tough competitor to beat.
